model.name: language
model.title: Language
model.description: Represents a parameterised language expression which can support any language at runtime using the language attribute.
model.label: language,core

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

language.description: The name of the language to use

trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

id.description: Sets the id of this node
